Iâ€™m just starting the recovery journey and my doctor said something that really struck my partner and I. My doctor told us in my last appointment, that it is not his job to make sure I eat, eat more, or donâ€™t eat, his job is to support me through meals, and support me emotionally since there is so much emotion in relation to food. As soon as my partner became my cheerleader on the sidelines, completely judgement free, he was there to support my meal time or help me prepare food when itâ€™s just too hard for me.
